titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Inhofe. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: 1/26/2005--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on Environment and Public Works for the 109th Congress.
